column1: #Text=Sokka says : " We 've got exactly three copper pieces left from the money that King Bumi gave us .
#Text=I could n't say no to this whistle !
#Text=" Sokka says : " It does n't even work .
#Text=Even Momo thinks it 's a piece of junk .
#Text=" Katara says : " No offense Aang , but I 'll hold the money from now on .
